mapper.insert: insert into neighbor.tbl_board_file (board_file_original_name, board_file_uuid, board_file_path, board_file_size, board_id) values(#{boardFileOriginalName}, #{boardFileUuid}, #{boardFilePath}, #{boardFileSize}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select board_file_id, board_file_original_name, board_file_uuid, board_file_path, board_file_size, board_id from tbl_board_file where board_file_path = date_format(current_timestamp() - interval 1 day, '%Y/%m/%d')
